query: On a scale from 1 to 7, where 1 means strongly oppose and 7 means strongly favor, what is your opinion on making abortion always legal?
On a scale from 1 to 7, where 1 means strongly oppose and 7 means strongly favor, what is your opinion on building a wall on the U.S. border with Mexico?
On a scale from 1 to 7, where 1 means strongly oppose and 7 means strongly favor, what is your opinion on allowing transgender people to use public bathrooms matching their gender identity?
On a scale from 1 to 7, where 1 means strongly oppose and 7 means strongly favor, what is your opinion on the U.S. giving weapons to help Ukraine fight Russia?
On a scale from 1 to 7, where 1 means strongly oppose and 7 means strongly favor, what is your opinion on the U.S. giving military assistance to Israel?
On a scale from 1 to 7, where 1 means strongly oppose and 7 means strongly favor, what is your opinion on the U.S. providing humanitarian assistance to Palestinians in the Gaza Strip?
